text: is a Japanese rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Japan Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Tochigi Prefecture Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Rowers at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games
title: Kazuhiko Kurata
